definition: ice/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/to chill sth/(of an object or substance) to feel cold/(of a person) cold/unfriendly/(slang) methamphetamine

sentences.english: Dr. budyko argues that at ice-free arctic ocean is the "normal" situation .
sentences.chinese: 布地柯博士認爲，北冰洋不凍纔是“正常”情況。

sentences.english: In some other minutes the smoke will fall onto the coast of the Arctic ocean.
sentences.chinese: 幾分鐘後，這片煙霧將會掉落在北冰洋的海岸。

sentences.english: Routes of Polar ocean development at the time of the ‘Krasin’.
sentences.chinese: “卡拉辛”時代的北冰洋開發路線。

sentences.english: A pod of narwhals makes its way through an ice passage in the Arctic.
sentences.chinese: 圖中一羣獨角鯨正在北冰洋的冰川間水面中游行。

sentences.english: The crew of the Arctic Sea have been told to keep their mouths shut.
sentences.chinese: “北冰洋”號的船員已經被要求閉嘴噤聲。

sentences.english: After returning from the Arctic Ocean, the ship was laid up for repairs.
sentences.chinese: 船從北冰洋返航以後就入塢修理。

sentences.english: Three British explorers are about to embark on a survey to map the Arctic Ocean's sea-ice cover.
sentences.chinese: 三位英國探險家即將啓程對北冰洋海冰進行勘查。

sentences.english: Eltrix River is the only one river running into the Arctic Ocean in China.
sentences.chinese: 額爾齊斯河是我國流入北冰洋的唯一國際性河流。

sentences.english: "arctic Ocean" electric fan presents a cool world to you.
sentences.chinese: “北冰洋”電扇，帶給您一個風涼世界。

sentences.english: The other bright region in the image is the polar ice cap over the Arctic Ocean.
sentences.chinese: 圖中另一塊明亮的區域則是北冰洋的極地冰冠。

sentences.english: A large ice floe in the Arctic Ocean bears an icicle-trimmed cave.
sentences.chinese: 北冰洋上的一塊大浮冰裏孕育着一個冰錐狀的洞穴。

sentences.english: Or piny promontory of the Arctic main.
sentences.chinese: 從北冰洋松樹似的岬角。

sentences.english: SiliCa, and North America that border on the Arctic Ocean.
sentences.chinese: 北美等瀕臨北冰洋的低窪沼澤平原的命名。

sentences.english: By the end of the century, the entire Arctic Ocean will be corrosively acidic.
sentences.chinese: 到本世紀末，整個北冰洋將會呈腐蝕酸性。

sentences.english: That shining sea was the Arctic Ocean.
sentences.chinese: 那一片清輝的大海便是北冰洋。

sentences.english: Another is the Labrador current - cold water coming down from the Arctic.
sentences.chinese: 另一股是拉布拉多灣流，從北冰洋下來的一般寒水流。

definition: the Bering Strait (between Siberia and Alaska)
the North Pole/the Arctic Pole/the north magnetic pole
